.. _template:

OP Template User Manual
=========================
OP template formed with ``Jinja2`` languge.

- Jinja2 is a modern and designer-friendly templating language for Python, modelled after Djangoâ€™s templates.
- Jinja2 is a library for Python that is designed to be flexible, fast and secure.


You can download or open OP template here :download:`op_template.pdf <_static/op_template.pdf>`
